name: groupthink - a multiplayer puzzle game
description:
Can you find the way out? Dozens of mind bending puzzles for single player and multiplayer.

groupthink: laser redirecting, teleporter holes, button pushing, sokoban-esque box shoving, and occasional races against time make groupthink a unique experience for puzzle gamers.

This game is in beta and is free, any feedback or optional payment is appreciated.

Over 120 puzzles and many more on the way:

* 40 single player puzzles with weekly updates on Monday and Thursday!

* Dozens of challenging multiplayer puzzles specifically designed for 2, 3, or 4 players.

* Build puzzles for friends and other grouthink players with the built in map builder system used to design all of the official maps.

* Compatible with XBOX 360 controllers plus three keyboard players.

* Play on one computer with friends and controllers or create/join a server for online or network play

NEW to version 0.50

* Network play

* Players can now move on diagonals.

* Box pushing system reworked, allowing players to pull boxes in any direction, not just forward/back.

version 0.50e

* Fixed a few network bugs, added a quick start guide for network multiplayer
